title: How to reset your password
content: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot password' on the login page, enter your email address, and follow the instructions in the email. If you do not receive the email within a few minutes, check your spam or junk folder.

title: What to do if your account is locked
content: If your account is locked after multiple failed login attempts, it will automatically unlock after 30 minutes. You can also contact support to unlock it sooner.

title: How to update your payment method
content: To update your payment method, go to Settings > Billing, click 'Update payment method', and enter your new card details. Make sure your billing address matches the one on file with your bank.

title: How to request a refund for duplicate charges
content: If you see duplicate charges on your invoice, please contact support with the invoice number and the last four digits of your card. Our team will review and process a refund if applicable.

title: How to cancel your subscription
content: You can cancel your subscription from Settings > Subscription. Your account will remain active until the end of the billing period, and you will not be charged again.

title: Downloading past invoices
content: To download past invoices, go to Settings > Billing > Invoices. You can download invoices individually as PDF for each billing period.

title: Improving dashboard performance
content: If your dashboard is slow, try reducing the date range of your reports, closing unused browser tabs, and ensuring you have a stable internet connection. Clearing your browser cache may also help.

title: Exporting data to CSV
content: You can export your data to CSV from the Reports page. Please note that exports are limited to 50,000 records per file. For larger exports, create multiple filtered reports.

title: Supported browsers and devices
content: Our app supports the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari. For the best experience on mobile, use our Android or iOS app.

title: Contacting customer support
content: You can contact customer support via in-app chat, email, or phone. Our support hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM (local time).
